hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct params from ElectParams as params join params.stdTypes as stdType join params.departs as depart where stdType.id =:stdTypeId and depart.id=:departId and (size(params.majors)=0 or :major=some elements(params.majors)) and (size(params.majorFields)=0 or :majorField=some elements(params.majorFields)) and (size(params.enrollTurns)=0 or :enrollTurn= some elements(params.enrollTurns)) and (size(params.stds)=0 or :stdId= some elements(params.stds)) and params.finishDate>= current_date
